text: Is there anything in HubSpot that would essentially be like a DND area or flex column, but without adding anything to the dom by default? As in the content system would work the same way, then in the template we could iterate over the data with hubl?

The react build we have going right now basically spits out the module data into the dom (as usual), then we use javascript to collect that data and turn it into react components... I'd like to see if there's a way to bypass that and pipe that data straight into a React element.
